actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-977.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral interests of the United States in property in Louisiana to the record owners of the surface of that property.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey the mineral interests of the United States in specified property in Louisiana to the record owners of the surface of such property.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral interests of the United States in property in Louisiana to the record owners of the surface of that property.
